        msk_file - master key file
        out_file - private key file

      throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypt file using private key and assuming public key.
        Parameters:
        pub_file - public key file name
        prv_file - private key file name
        in_file - encrypted file
        out_file - decrypted file

        java.lang.Exception
